sentences.sContent: Do you think that the spider can web anything?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you think that the spider can web anything?
sentences.sCn: 你觉得这蜘蛛能用网捕住什么吗?

sentences.sContent: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.sCn: 在这整个蜘蛛出没的季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.sContent: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.sContent_eng: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.sCn: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

synos.tran: [无脊椎]蜘蛛；设圈套者；三脚架

words.tran: 细长足的；蜘蛛一般的；蜘蛛网一般的

trans.tranOther: a small creature with eight legs, which catches insects using a fine network of sticky threads
